org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa
Class Minimization

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.Minimization

public class Minimization
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for the minimization of classic finite automata.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Constructor Summary
Minimization()
           
 
Method Summary
static FSA minimize(FSA aut)
          Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW by the default minimization algorithm.
static FSA minimizeByClassical(FSA aut)
          Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW by a classical algorithm.
static FSA minimizeByHopcroft(FSA aut)
          Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW.

Constructor Detail

Minimization

public Minimization()
Method Detail

minimizeByHopcroft

public static FSA minimizeByHopcroft(FSA aut)
Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW. The NFW is determinized first and then minimized by the Hopcroft's algorithm [John Hopcroft. An n log n algorithm for minimizing states in a finite automaton. In Theory of Machines and Computations, pages 186-196. Academic Press, 1971. 177(14):2821-2844, 2007].

Parameters:
aut - an NFW
Returns:
a minimized DFW of the NFW aut

minimizeByClassical

public static FSA minimizeByClassical(FSA aut)
Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW by a classical algorithm. The NFW is determinized first and then minimized.

Parameters:
aut - an NFW
Returns:
a minimized DFW of the NFW aut

minimize

public static FSA minimize(FSA aut)
Returns a minimized DFW for a specified NFW by the default minimization algorithm.

Parameters:
aut - an NFW
Returns:
a minimized DFW of the NFW aut
